thread.title: Little Mix's Jesy Nelson cuddles up to rumoured flame TOWIE's Chris Clark backstage at the BRIT Awards
thread.title_full: Little Mix's Jesy Nelson cuddles up to rumoured flame TOWIE's Chris Clark backstage at the BRIT Awards - Mirror Online

author: mirror.co.uk
title: Little Mix's Jesy Nelson cuddles up to rumoured flame TOWIE's Chris Clark backstage at the BRIT Awards
text:
Little Mix's Jesy Nelson cuddles up to rumoured flame TOWIE's Chris Clark backstage at the BRIT Awards "I don't want this girl to go back America tomorrow!" he wrote alongside the telling snap Share Comments By Zoe Shenton 01:26, 23 FEB 2017 Celebs A budding romance? celebs Little Mix singer Jesy Nelson and TOWIE star Chris Clark did little to dispel the recent romance rumours as they cuddled up together backstage at the Brit Awards on Wednesday night.
Jesy, who scooped her first ever Brit along with her bandmates on the night, had an arm wrapped around Chris' stomach while he put an affectionate arm around her neck.
He wrote alongside the sweet shot: “I don’t want this girl to go back America tomorrow!"
"I approve!" wrote one fan underneath the photo, while another said the pair made a "cute couple".
https://www.instagram.com/p/BQ1Q26cA22q/?taken-by=chrisjclark_&hl=en/embed (Photo: Rex Features) The Little Mix ladies slay their performance (Photo: PA) The cosy display comes days after Jesy was spotted showing off her best dance movies with the 22-year-old reality star in a series of Snapchat videos posted by Jesy's friend Sam King during a night out.
And the footage was shared just weeks after the pair started following each other on picture sharing app Instagram.
Video Loading Video Unavailable Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Watch this video again Video will play in Perrie Edwards gives viewers an eyeful at Brits Share this video Watch Next Little Mix (Photo: PA) Read More Jesy Nelson parties with TOWIE's Chris Clark as she grabs her friend's boobs and shows off sexy moves For 25-year-old Jesy, the romance rumours come after she recently ended her engagement to Rixton singer Jake Roche, and said she was "loving" single life.
The Shout Out to My Ex star said: "I'm free, ­single and loving life. I'd really like to experience flirting with an American guy. That would be nice ...
"I've found a lot of ­independence. I think you learn a lot more about yourself when you're single."
